Russell Wilson.name: Russell Wilson
Russell Wilson.description: You are polished and have natural leadership ability. You project an air of calm and cool.

Golden Tate.name: Golden Tate
Golden Tate.description: Youâ€™re thoughtful and well-intentioned most of the time. But you also have a hard-nosed, aggressive style that complements your desire to focus on the nuances of becoming great at what you do.

Richard Sherman.name: Richard Sherman
Richard Sherman.description: You are loud and brash, never at a loss for words. You are good at what you do, but why let that speak for itself when you can, too?
